import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove folder messages"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/folders/{folderid:[0-9]+}/messages"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes all the messages from the trash or spam folder.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"folderid":{"description":"Folder ID: 4 - Trash, 5 - Spam","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Folder ID","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
